feed.title: Snubs
feed.subtitle: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.

author.name: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

entry.title: Legally Blonde - Season 1 Episode 18
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Reese Witherspoon’s magnum opus, Legally Blonde, and the 2002 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline has a real soft spot for Luke Wilson, and Chris would do surprisingly well in a sorority.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Ferris Bueller’s Day Off - Season 1 Episode 17

link.title: Ferris Bueller’s Day Off - Season 1 Episode 17

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss John Hughes’s Ferris Bueller’s Day Off and the 1987 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is a modern day Jeanie Bueller, and Chris had an incredibly awkward interaction with Alan Ruck (Cameron) in a Burbank neighborhood.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Alien - Season 1 Episode 16
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Ridley Scott’s Alien and the 1980 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline could never have fought the Alien in her underwear, and Chris can identify Sigourney Weaver’s voice better than his own father’s.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: Heat - Season 1 Episode 15
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Michael Mann’s Heat and the 1996 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline attempts a semi-successful Al Pacino impression, and Chris unfortunately has to demean himself with Ralph to get Vincent Hanna’s attention.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: Major League - Season 1 Episode 14
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with special guest Mike Young (Caroline’s dad) discuss the sports comedy Major League and the 1990 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline tries to be a good sport, no pun intended, Chris is absolutely tickled by this Snubs pick, and Mike sees no need for My Left Foot.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Shining - Season 1 Episode 13
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with a panel of guests (Taylor Fried, Hailey Aldrich, Lizzy Smith, Julia Bertussi, and Kristian Labrie), discuss Stanley Kubrick’s The Shining and the 1981 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline hesitantly breaks pod dogma for this episode, and Chris wishes there was a Jack Nicholson cameo in Spotlight.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall - Season 1 Episode 12
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss the Jason Segals’s writing feat, Forgetting Sarah Marshall and the 2009 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants nothing more than to have Bill Hader as a guest on the pod, and Chris’s Hawaiian name is Peyope.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: The Game - Season 1 Episode 11
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss David Fincher’s The Game and the 1998 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Chris can’t wait to talk about his deep passion for James Rebhorn and Caroline would’ve given up The Game immediately.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith - Season 1 Episode 10

link.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith - Season 1 Episode 10

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with special guest Gavin Berger, discuss George Lucas’s Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith and the 2006 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline doesn’t know why we are doing this episode, Chris can’t stop doing an Emperor Palpatine impression, and Gavin just wants to talk about The Clone Wars.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Big Lebowski - Season 1 Episode 9
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss the Coen Brothers film, The Big Lebowski, and the 1999 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline has had enough of Warren Beatty, and Chris’s refusal to work on the Shabbas put a wrench in our podcasting schedule.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
